resources.string: Welcome to my app! You can do Logarithm, Exponential and Square Root calculations with using this app!
A logarithm is a mathematical function that represents the exponent to which a specified base must be raised to produce a given number. It is typically abbreviated as "log".
Exponential describes growth or decay that occurs at a rate proportional to the current value.
The square root is a mathematical operation that determines a value which, when multiplied by itself, gives the original number.
